author: vmassol
msg: - Fixed the test webapp context when deploying EAR files (see bug <http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=22794)
- Introduced notion of DeployableFile (WarDeployableFile and EarDeployableFile) to factorize all the code related to the WAR or EAR files that we need to deploy to a container

author: vmassol
msg: Replaced FIXME by TODO so that Eclipse and checkstyle pick it up by default

author: vmassol
msg: When using the new ServletTestSuite wrapper around pure JUnit test cases, the setUp() and tearDown() methods were not called.

author: vmassol
msg: Replaced FIXME by TODO so that Eclipse and checkstyle pick it up by default
